function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Insufficient revenue generation from tourism for pcas","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on cyclical funding sources, such as seasonal tourism, may lead to financial instability and funding gaps.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heavy reliance on private sector investments may lead to prioritization of profit over public health and safety measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of long-term funding commitments from governments may deter private sector investments in income-generating enterprises, leading to reduced financial sustainability for disease prevention and control efforts.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crowdfunding campaigns may lead to increased public gatherings and physical interactions, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The spread of contagious diseases such as covid-19 in vulnerable communities within protected and conserved areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pca budget allocation due to the current crisis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective use of existing pca resources","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration between public and private sectors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of budget allocation for pcas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate focus on job creation with biodiversity benefits","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underutilization of nature-based solutions nbs for climate change mitigation and adaptation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integrated planning at national level","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relaxation of regulations increasing pressure on pcas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of funding security for pcas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Subnational governments managing pcas may need specific support from national government.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The impact of donor funds can be enhanced through better access to information on funding opportunities and support for potential recipients in applying for funding.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Funding primarily allocated for achieving sustainable development and climate change adaptation and mitigation objectives can have a substantial positive impact on pca funding.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased tourism can lead to the spread of contagious diseases in protected conservation areas pcas .","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on tourism as a primary source of income for local communities and economies.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for crowded or congested tourist attractions leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay or reluctance to update entrance and other fees for protected conservation areas pcas leading to financial
